name: Labyrinth Deception
description:
Labyrinth Deception is a little project created in less than 3 hours as part of school work.


The game base is very simple, we are in a labyrinth and time is running out. We must find all the keys to be able to open the door and escape.


The game will evolve over time because I want to make it a very scary little horror game. 
 I will add textures and assets as well as an enemy chasing us and other events to slow down the progress of the player. VFX and sound design will be added.
The light system will also change.
Buleprint programming in UE4
